Plot: Four waves of increasingly deadly alien attacks have left most of Earth decimated. Cassie is on the run, desperately trying to save her younger brother.
Title: The 5th Wave
Writer: Susannah Grant (screenplay), Akiva Goldsman (screenplay), Jeff Pinkner (screenplay), Rick Yancey (novel)
Actors: Chloë Grace Moretz, Matthew Zuk, Gabriela Lopez, Bailey Anne Borders
